name: Greek Dungeon
description:
Controls

WASD | Left Analog: Move
Left Click | Controller LB Shoulder: Melee Attack

Hold Right Click | Controller RB Shoulder: Ranged Attack

Dash | Controller R Shoulder: Spacebar

Mouse | Right Analog: Aim

You can play multiplayer by connecting 1 or more controllers, if you want you can destroy the default keyboard player by pressing delete.
